verses.verse: Ask <S%H7592><s%> ye of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of the latter rain <S%H4456><s%>; so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H6213><s%> bright clouds <S%H2385><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> them showers <S%H1653><s%> of rain <S%H4306><s%>, to every one <S%H376><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>. bright: or, lightnings

For the idols <S%H8655><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> vanity <S%H205><s%>, and the diviners <S%H7080><s%> have seen <S%H2372><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%>, and have told <S%H1696><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> dreams <S%H2472><s%>; they comfort <S%H5162><s%> in vain <S%H1892><s%>: therefore they went <S%H5265><s%> their way as a flock <S%H6629><s%>, they were troubled <S%H6031><s%>, because there was no shepherd <S%H7462><s%>. idols: Heb. teraphims were: or, answered that, etc

Mine anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against the shepherds <S%H7462><s%>, and I punished <S%H6485><s%> the goats <S%H6260><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath visited <S%H6485><s%> his flock <S%H5739><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and hath made <S%H7760><s%> them as his goodly <S%H1935><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>. punished: Heb. visited upon

Out of him came forth <S%H3318><s%> the corner <S%H6438><s%>, out of him the nail <S%H3489><s%>, out of him the battle <S%H4421><s%> bow <S%H7198><s%>, out of him every oppressor <S%H5065><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

And they shall be as mighty <S%H1368><s%> men, which tread down <S%H947><s%> their enemies in the mire <S%H2916><s%> of the streets <S%H2351><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%>: and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%>, because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is with them, and the riders <S%H7392><s%> on horses <S%H5483><s%> shall be confounded <S%H3001><s%>. the riders: or, they shall make the riders on horses ashamed

And I will strengthen <S%H1396><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and I will save <S%H3467><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and I will bring them again to place <S%H3427><s%> them; for I have mercy <S%H7355><s%> upon them: and they shall be as though <S%H834><s%> I had not cast them off <S%H2186><s%>: for I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>, and will hear <S%H6030><s%> them.

And they of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall be like a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man, and their heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> as through wine <S%H3196><s%>: yea, their children <S%H1121><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it, and be glad <S%H8055><s%>; their heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
I will hiss <S%H8319><s%> for them, and gather <S%H6908><s%> them; for I have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> them: and they shall increase <S%H7235><s%> as they have increased <S%H7235><s%>.

And I will sow <S%H2232><s%> them among the people <S%H5971><s%>: and they shall remember <S%H2142><s%> me in far countries <S%H4801><s%>; and they shall live <S%H2421><s%> with their children <S%H1121><s%>, and turn again <S%H7725><s%>.

I will bring them again <S%H7725><s%> also out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> them out of Assyria <S%H804><s%>; and I will bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>; and place shall not be found <S%H4672><s%> for them.

And he shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> with affliction <S%H6869><s%>, and shall smite <S%H5221><s%> the waves <S%H1530><s%> in the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and all the deeps <S%H4688><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%> shall dry up <S%H3001><s%>: and the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> shall be brought down <S%H3381><s%>, and the sceptre <S%H7626><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall depart away <S%H5493><s%>.
And I will strengthen <S%H1396><s%> them in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and they shall walk up and down <S%H1980><s%> in his name <S%H8034><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
